column1: # DESCRIPTION: Promote meter registers from Orion tables to DataStore

column5: One to one mapping with int cast
One to one mapping with coalesce and nvarchar cast
One to one mapping with nvarchar cast

column3: WHEN '1' THEN 'Internet' WHEN '2' THEN 'Electricity' WHEN '3' THEN 'Gas' WHEN '7' THEN 'Telco' ELSE NULL END AS nvarchar(11))
WHEN 'E' THEN 'Export' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Import' ELSE NULL END AS nchar(6))
WHEN 1 THEN 'Active' WHEN 2 THEN 'Inactive' ELSE NULL END AS nchar(8))
IS NULL THEN 'Physical' ELSE CONCAT('Virtual - ', utl_virtual_meter_type.virtual_meter_type_desc) END AS nvarchar(20))

column2: FROM [schema].utl_meter LEFT JOIN [schema].utl_meter_header ON utl_meter_header.meter_header_id = utl_meter.meter_header_id INNER JOIN [schema].utl_meter_type ON utl_meter_type.meter_type_id = utl_meter.meter_type_id INNER JOIN [schema].utl_meter_class ON utl_meter_class.meter_class_id = utl_meter_type.meter_class_id LEFT JOIN [schema].utl_virtual_meter_type ON utl_virtual_meter_type.virtual_meter_type_id = utl_meter.virtual_meter_type_id  WHERE (utl_meter.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId > @LatestSuccessfulTaskExecutionInstanceID OR utl_meter_header.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId > @LatestSuccessfulTaskExecutionInstanceID OR utl_meter_type.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId > @LatestSuccessfulTaskExecutionInstanceID OR utl_meter_type.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId > @LatestSuccessfulTaskExecutionInstanceID OR utl_virtual_meter_type.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId > @LatestSuccessfulTaskExecutionInstanceID)
